attributes.action: David Cameron should be put to a vote of 'no confidence' in his performance in office todate.
attributes.additional_details: David Cameron should step down as he repeatedly demonstrates he lacks the appropriate skills and values to deliver professionally and respectfully the government’s objectives.  He has made politically incorrect statements; failing to adhere to laws imposed on voters and taxpayers of political correctness and has shown no remorse or even a desire to improve his attitude.  His inability to demonstrate respect for colleagues brings in to question his attitude towards taxpayers and the ambassadors of other countries.

rejection.details: Votes of No Confidence are a matter for Parliament not the Government.
